subsection.name: jaux
subsection.p: The jaux package implements a miscellaneous set of classes that would otherwise be reinvented repeatedly by software on this site.

ul.li: Constraints class for "assertions that cannot be turned off".
CheckedMath class for machine integer arithmetic that does not silently overflow.
"Functional" programming features - Function class, Unit, Option types, etc.
Convenient unchecked exception types for marking unreachable and unimplemented code.
Platform independent (tested on FreeBSD, Linux, Mac OS X, Solaris, Windows XP).
